subsections.text: Creative and detail-oriented web developer with a passion for building user-friendly and responsive websites. Skilled in modern web technologies and committed to delivering high-quality solutions. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and exceed client expectations.

items.Programming Languages: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, PHP, TypeScript
items.Frameworks and Libraries: React, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js, Django, Tailwind CSS
items.Tools and Platforms: Git, Webpack, Docker, AWS, Firebase, Jenkins
items.Development Practices: Agile, Test-Driven Development, Continuous Integration, Code Reviews

subsections.title: Frontend Developer
subsections.subtitle: Tech Solutions Inc.
items: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React and Redux.
Collaborated with designers and backend developers to create seamless user experiences.
Optimized website performance, reducing load times by 30%.
Implemented accessibility best practices to ensure compliance with WCAG standards.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain code quality.

subsections.title: Junior Web Developer
subsections.subtitle: Creative Web Studio
items: Built and maintained client websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented SEO best practices to improve website rankings.
Provided technical support and troubleshooting for website issues.
Collaborated with clients to gather requirements and deliver tailored solutions.
Created reusable components to streamline development processes.

subsections.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
subsections.subtitle: State University
items: Graduated with honors, specializing in web development and user experience design.
Completed a senior capstone project focused on building a responsive e-commerce platform.
Active member of the Computer Science Club, organizing coding workshops and hackathons.

subsections.title: Portfolio Website
subsections.subtitle: Personal Project
items: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills.
Implemented a blog section using a headless CMS for content management.
Optimized for performance and SEO, achieving a 95+ score on Google Lighthouse.
